display.title: Spectra Spectra
description: &&7[Aurora's Decorations]&&r A &&3Painter's Palette&&r allows for conveniently drawing on &&3Blackboards&&r and &&3Glassboards&&r &&dwithout consuming dyes&&r.
A &&3Palette&&r can be opened using &&7[&&r&&6Sneak+Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r to insert &&3tools&&r and &&3Dyes&&r.
Once inserted, &&3Dyes&&r can be swapped using &&7[&&r&&6Sneak+Scroll&&r&&7]&&r and &&3tools&&r can be swapped using &&7[&&r&&6Sneak+Sprint+Scroll&&r&&7]&&r.
The default &&3Pixel&&r tool, which affects &&done pixel&&r.
&&eWhite Wool&&r provides the &&3Brush&&r tool, which affects &&dnine pixels&&r.
A &&eStick&&r provides the &&3Line&&r tool, which affects &&dpixels in a line&&r between two pixels.
A &&eBucket&&r provides a &&3Fill&&r tool, which affects a &&dsingle-color area&&r.
An &&eEnder Pearl&&r provides the &&3Replace&&r tool, which affects &&dall pixels of one colour&&r.
As dyes, &&ePaper&&r clears a pixel, &&eBone Meal&&r lightens a colour, &&eCoal&&r darkens a colour, and &&eGlowstone&&r makes a colour saturated.
Remember to &&3Wax&&r your finished board! Boards are be &&dfully cleared&&r using &&3Water&&r if they're not waxed.
